sentences:
Sentence 0:
The finally genetic strain YJM13 harboring the MVA pathway and ispS(Pa) gene could accumulate isoprene up to 2.48 mg/l and 532 mg/l under the flask and fed-batch fermentation conditions, respectively, which is about three times and five times to the control strain.
sentence_raw: The finally genetic strain YJM13 harboring the MVA pathway and ispS(Pa) gene could accumulate isoprene up to 2.48 mg/l and 532 mg/l under the flask and fed-batch fermentation conditions, respectively, which is about three times and five times to the control strain.
